content:
att.measurement

provides attributes to represent a regularized or normalized measurement.
Moduletei â€” Declarations for classes, datatypes, and macros available to all TEI modules
Membersmeasure measureGrp unit
Attributes
@unit
indicates the units used for the measurement, usually using the standard symbol for the desired units.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.enumerated
@unitRef
points to a unique identifier stored in the xml:id of a unitDef element that defines a unit of measure.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.pointer
@quantity
specifies the number of the specified units that comprise the measurement
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.numeric
@commodity
indicates the substance that is being measured
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.word
